title: First Post: Welcome to My Blog!
content: This is the very first post on my new blog. Look at https://github.com/AnkyloZaur/blog-html for the source code. Available under the GPL-3.0 license.

title: Second Post: Features
content: In this post, I will describe the features of this blog template. It reads posts from a JSON file and displays them in a HTML popup.

title: Third Post: Customization
content: You can customize the blog by editing the CSS file. Feel free to change the styles to your liking. For example, you can change the background color or font size.

title: Fourth Post: Future Plans
content: I plan to add more features in the future. Stay tuned!
